name: Javier López Cacenave
subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
pageNotFoundMsg: Oops! It seems the page you were looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

aboutShort.hook: I work with people who want to win. Is that you?

aboutLong.headline: Vision + Pragmatism
aboutLong.intro: Driven by innate curiosity and a hands-on approach, I transform complex needs into simple yet effective full-stack software solutions that deliver tangible results.
aboutLong.storyParagraph1: Ever since I was young, I've been fascinated by technology and the 'how' of things. But my interest doesn't just stop at understanding; I constantly ask, 'How could this be *better*?'. This duality shapes my work: I possess an intuitive ability—reminiscent of my father's own intuition—that allows me to perceive underlying needs and envision creative solutions, almost like a sixth sense for potential.
aboutLong.storyParagraph2: However, I understand that even the most brilliant ideas are worthless if they aren't practical and communicable—a crucial lesson inherited from my mother's hard pragmatism. That's why I always anchor that vision in practicality: seeking tangible outcomes, defining clear steps, and building solutions people can actually use, right here, right now. This knack for balancing forward-thinking vision with immediate, real-world utility is central to how I operate.
aboutLong.storyParagraph3: My goal is to merge these two facets: envision and pragmatism.
aboutLong.caseStudyParagraph1: A prime example is the custom ERP built for Ortoprodent. This dental lab is renowned for the quality of its prosthetics and the skill of its team. However, like many specialized businesses, their administrative management posed significant challenges, draining valuable time and energy. Anticipating that off-the-shelf software would be overly complex for their specific needs, I opted for a pragmatic, built-from-scratch approach. The priority was an exceptionally user-friendly experience (minimal cognitive load), featuring highly streamlined workflows and a clean interface. The result? A tool that doesn't just organize, but actually smooths out management friction, allowing the team to dedicate all their talent to what they do best: crafting outstanding prosthetic work.
aboutLong.approachTitle: My Approach: From Need to Solution
aboutLong.approachStep1Desc: Deep dive into the core challenge, connecting human needs and business goals with technical feasibility to define the fundamental 'what' and 'why'.
aboutLong.approachStep2Desc: Merge creative vision with pragmatic design: architect the solution and define the optimal user experience, charting a clear path to the desired outcome.
aboutLong.approachStep3Desc: Bring the solution to life: build functional, robust software that solves the identified challenge, delivering measurable value and enhancing the experience for everyone involved.

royalTikTok.name: Royal TikTok
royalTikTok.summary: Designed and implemented a data platform for extracting, transforming, and exposing unstructured data from TikTok LIVE for talent recruitment.
details: Developed advanced scraping solutions (Playwright, BeautifulSoup) and integrated official/private APIs for data acquisition.
Built an ETL pipeline using Pandas for data cleaning, normalization, and dynamic filtering.
Orchestrated the entire process using APScheduler for automated execution.
Exposed curated data via a RESTful API built with FastAPI, enabling multi-output scenarios (e.g., Notion API integration for user-facing lists).
Focused on a modular, reusable design applicable to other domains with chaotic data.
Key results included a 20-30% increase in client's monthly revenue and significantly faster talent acquisition.
royalTikTok.mediaAlt1: Visual representation of the Royal TikTok data pipeline or results

ortoprodent.name: Ortoprodent ERP
ortoprodent.summary: Developed a custom ERP software solution for a dental laboratory, significantly improving their organization and workflow.
details: Built a tailored software application from scratch to manage all lab processes.
Focused obsessively on ease of use (minimal cognitive load UX) and convenience for a non-technical user.
Met all specified requirements and designed for future extensibility.
Resulted in radical efficiency gains and high user satisfaction (see testimonial).
ortoprodent.mediaAlt1: Screenshot or mockup of the Ortoprodent ERP interface

teldat.summary: Contributed as a Full-Stack Developer to 'XDR/be.Analyzer', a complex, multi-tenant network monitoring and analysis platform.
teldat.projectContextPurposeDesc: A comprehensive, multi-tenant platform designed for network device management, real-time traffic analysis (handling NetFlow, sFlow, etc.), telemetry visualization via customizable dashboards, network asset management, and hierarchical user/permission management. Features included licensing controls and potential AI-driven anomaly detection.
teldat.projectContextArchDesc: Multi-tiered architecture featuring a Django/DRF REST API backend, PostgreSQL for relational metadata (users, devices, configs), Apache Druid for time-series telemetry data storage and querying, Redis for caching and Celery message brokering, and Celery for asynchronous task execution. Designed for containerized deployment (Docker), likely targeting cloud environments (GCP).
projectContextModules: Dashboards & Reporting (Customizable Widgets, PDF Exports, Alarms)
details: Developed and maintained backend REST API services using Python, Django, and Django Rest Framework (DRF) with PostgreSQL for core platform functionalities like user management, device configuration, and data retrieval within the 'be.Analyzer' system.
Utilized Celery for handling asynchronous background tasks such as periodic report generation, alarm processing, and license validation.
Leveraged Redis for caching API responses and as a message broker for Celery.
Integrated with Kafka for consuming or producing event streams related to network data or system events.
Worked with Apache Druid, focusing on querying and retrieving large volumes of time-series network telemetry data to support the platform's traffic analysis features.
Implemented and maintained API documentation using SwaggerUI (via drf-yasg) for clarity and ease of integration.
Configured and utilized Honeybadger for real-time error monitoring and alerting in the backend services.
Wrote unit and integration tests using Pytest and related libraries (e.g., factory-boy) to ensure code quality and reliability.
Managed application development and deployment environments using Docker containers.
Significantly contributed to reducing technical debt and improving maintainability of the legacy React frontend system, which was inherited from previous external development efforts.

driveMeGroup.summary: Improved an ETL process and reporting system to consolidate leads, compare vehicle prices, and enable dynamic pricing for a used car rental group.
details: Integrated data from diverse sources: third-party car websites (via scraping/API RE), Call Center leads, and website vehicle inquiries.
Integrated Twilio API for Call Center functional enablement.
Utilized Zoho Dataprep for data transformation and cleaning.
Leveraged Zoho Analytics to create dashboards, generate insights, and present data storytelling for management.
Implemented API integrations and reverse engineered APIs where necessary.
Improved logic for dynamic vehicle outsourcing: checking cost/availability from third parties and applying a pricing algorithm based on margin and costs if a requested vehicle wasn't in the fleet.
driveMeGroup.mediaAlt1: Example Zoho Analytics dashboard or data flow diagram for Drive Me Group

grindrPlus.title: Grindr Plus
grindrPlus.summary: An Android Xposed Module mod exploring premium features of the Grindr dating app.
details: Performed static and dynamic analysis of the obfuscated Android application (Kotlin/Java).
Utilized Xposed Framework for runtime hooking and modification.
Intercepted and analyzed network traffic (using tools like Burp Suite) to understand private API interactions.
Successfully enabled certain premium features locally for educational purposes.
Demonstrates practical application of reverse engineering techniques on mobile platforms.
Driven by curiosity and the challenge of understanding closed-source systems.
grindrPlus.mediaAlt1: Conceptual image related to Grindr Plus modding/RE

csosBeacon.title: Cobalt Strike Open Source Beacon
csosBeacon.summary: Developed a functional open-source C2 beacon inspired by Cobalt Strike, built from scratch in C.
details: Researched Command and Control (C2) communication patterns and techniques.
Implemented core beacon functionality, including check-ins and task retrieval.
Developed communication channels over HTTP, TCP, and SMB (via Named Pipes).
Interacted directly with the Win32 API for system-level operations.
Included basic Powershell execution capabilities for simulated post-exploitation tasks.
Motivated by a deep interest in cybersecurity, malware analysis, and low-level systems programming.
csosBeacon.mediaAlt1: Diagram or code snippet related to the CSOS Beacon project

idealistillo.title: Idealistillo
idealistillo.summary: Developed 'Idealistillo', a Python client library wrapping the Idealista API for property data.
details: Provides a simple, intuitive Python interface to interact with Idealista's property data API (official or otherwise).
Handles authentication, pagination, and endpoint abstraction.
Simplifies data retrieval for personal analysis or integration into other projects.

santiago.quote: Working with Javier was a before and after for our agency. From day one, he understood our needs and completely transformed our TikTok LIVE recruitment system, automating manual processes and significantly improving our efficiency. In just a few months, we achieved a 20-30% increase in monthly revenue thanks to faster and more accurate talent acquisition.

elena.quote: I'm super organized since they set up this program for me, it's super easy and super convenient, I have everything I need. And on top of that, they told me that anything I come up with, they'll add it to the program. I'm super happy, I recommend it 100%.

skills: Advanced English (Oral & Written defense of complex philosophical arguments)
ipo.sourceLabel1: Todo en la vida es filosofía (Hoy)

oif.title: Iberoamerican Philosophy Olympiad

hackaboss.summary: Intensive bootcamp focused on practical Data Science and AI skills, providing a strong foundation for subsequent data-focused roles.
hackaboss.description: Covered the full data science lifecycle from data acquisition and processing to machine learning modeling and deployment basics.

unex.summary: Completed ~3 years of coursework in Software Engineering before discontinuing.
unex.notes: Driven by a deep intellectual curiosity and a focus on innovative practices, I have opted for a professional path that allows me to develop my potential and generate value in a more agile and direct manner. This decision stems from my desire to overcome the limitations often found within traditional academia, seeking an environment where I can foster my growth and contribute more effectively.
